title: Mainstays Cool Mist Humidifier, 1 gallon, Black; low tank indicator; Dish washer safe; Humidity capacity: 142ml/h; Aroma tray; 3 speeds; mechanical knob; covers 320 sq. ft. area, weight: 6.33 lbs
descriptions:
Introducing the Mainstays Cool Mist Humidifier in sleek black, the perfect addition to your home! This powerful humidifier boasts a generous 1-gallon tank capacity, ensuring long-lasting moisture for your space. Say goodbye to dry air and hello to a comfortable environment.

With its cool mist evaporative technology, this humidifier releases a soothing mist that helps relieve dryness and congestion, making it perfect for bedrooms, living rooms, and offices. The low tank indicator ensures that you never run out of water unexpectedly, keeping your space consistently moisturized.

Cleaning is a breeze with the dishwasher-safe feature, making maintenance hassle-free. The aroma tray allows you to enhance your space with your favorite scents, creating a calming and relaxing atmosphere. Choose from three different speeds to customize your desired humidity level, all easily adjustable with the mechanical knob control.

Covering an impressive 320 sq. ft. area, this Mainstays Cool Mist Humidifier is perfect for small to medium-sized rooms. Its lightweight design, weighing only 6.33 lbs, allows for easy portability and placement wherever you need it most.

Rest easy knowing that this humidifier also includes empty tank protection, automatically shutting off when the water level is low, preventing any damage to the unit. With its compatibility with the BestAir H62 replacement filter, you can ensure that your humidifier continues to provide clean and fresh mist.

Don't miss out on the Mainstays Cool Mist Humidifier in black, the ultimate solution to combat dry air and create a comfortable space. Upgrade your home today and experience the benefits of optimal humidity.

Introducing the Mainstays Cool Mist Humidifier, the perfect addition to your home for a healthier and more comfortable living environment. This sleek and stylish humidifier comes in a striking black color, adding a touch of elegance to any room.

With a generous tank capacity of 1 gallon, this humidifier ensures long-lasting operation without the need for constant refills. Plus, the low tank indicator feature lets you know when it's time to refill, so you never have to worry about running out of moisture.

Cleaning up is a breeze with the dishwasher-safe design, making maintenance quick and hassle-free. Say goodbye to tedious hand-washing and spend more time enjoying the benefits of a humidified space.

Experience optimal humidity levels with a capacity of 142ml per hour, providing you with a refreshing and rejuvenating atmosphere. Breathe easier, alleviate dry skin, and promote better sleep with this cool mist evaporative technology.

Enhance your environment with the aroma tray feature, allowing you to add your favorite scents and create a soothing ambiance. Choose from 3 different speed settings to suit your preferences and customize the level of comfort.

Control the humidifier effortlessly with the convenient mechanical knob, giving you full control over the humidity levels. The Mainstays Cool Mist Humidifier covers an impressive area of 320 square feet, ensuring that every corner of your room benefits from the soothing mist.

Weighing in at only 6.33 lbs, this lightweight humidifier is easy to move around and transport, making it ideal for use in different areas of your home.

Rest easy knowing that this humidifier is compatible with the BestAir H62 replacement filter, ensuring clean and purified mist for a healthier living environment. Additionally, the empty tank protection feature ensures the longevity of the humidifier by automatically shutting off when the tank is empty.

Don't miss out on the opportunity to experience the benefits of a well-humidified space. Invest in the Mainstays Cool Mist Humidifier today and enjoy a healthier and more comfortable living environment for you and your loved ones.
